text.headline: My first professional work
text.text: After graduating from bachelor of economics, I decided to work as a financial correspondent in television.

text.headline: My First Overseas Project Shooting
text.text: The overseas project lasted for a week, I developed my ability of project management greatly from the shooting project.

text.headline: My First Exposure to Data Analysis
text.text: I was tasked with social media management of the financial program, I led the team to make the follower increase from 0 to 50k.

text.headline: My Back to Economics
text.text: This was the time I started to pursue a master degree of Economics in University of Mannheim

text.headline: My introduction to text analysis project
text.text: I was working as research assistant for an academic project regarding the text classification and analysis of Chinese Patent, classifying the patent text into two different categories.

text.headline: My project of social housing system in Vienna
text.text: I joined the one week long workshop with the challenge from Stadt Vienna about providing solution for better, economical and sustainable social housing system in city Vienna.

text.headline: My internship as a Data Analyst
text.text: I started my internship at Mercedes-Benz Mobility as a data analyst, working on credit scoring model.
